caption.title: Study site: the city of Manacapuru, state of Amazonas, Brazil.
caption.p: The black circles indicate the location of the 100 dwellings monitored for mosquito vectors; the green circles indicate the location of the 1,000 pyriproxyfen dissemination stations. Circles are overlaid on a schematic of Manacapuru; locations are approximate. The map of Latin America was drawn using the maps library in R 3.1.2 ( https://www.r-project.org/).
